title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/principles
author: LinOnetwo
name: Principles 原则
description: Record life principles as tiddlers and review them 记人生原则为诸条目，时习之
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/principles/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/principles/"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/principles/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/principles/"/></$button>

This plugin allows you to record your life principles in the form of an outline, and engrave them in your brain like a mental steel stamp through spaced repetition technique, so that you can program yourself, learn from mistakes, and keep improving.

这个插件让你可以以大纲的形式记录你的人生原则，并通过间隔重复技术将它们像思想钢印一样铭刻在你的大脑中，从而能对自己编程，从错误中学习，不断进步。
